```html
    <script>
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
            const microphoneBtn = document.getElementById('microphoneBtn');
            const commandStatus = document.getElementById('commandStatus');
            const commandHistory = document.getElementById('commandHistory');
            const websitePreview = document.getElementById('websitePreview');
            const componentBtns = document.querySelectorAll('.component-btn');
            const exportHtmlBtn = document.getElementById('exportHtmlBtn');
            const clearAllBtn = document.getElementById('clearAllBtn');
            
            let recognition;
            let isListening = false;
            let websiteComponents = [];
            
            // Initialize speech recognition
            function initSpeechRecognition() {
                try {
                    const SpeechRecognition = window.SpeechRecognition || window.webkitSpeechRecognition;
                    recognition = new SpeechRecognition();
                    recognition.continuous = true;
                    recognition.interimResults = true;
                    recognition.lang = 'hi-IN'; // Hindi (India) as default
                    
                    recognition.onstart = function() {
                        isListening = true;
                        microphoneBtn.classList.add('listening');
                        commandStatus.textContent = '‡§∏‡•Å‡§® ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§π‡•Ç‡§Å... ‡§¨‡•ã‡§≤‡§ø‡§è';
                    };
                    
                    recognition.onerror = function(event) {
                        console.error('Speech recognition error', event.error);
                        commandStatus.textContent = '‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡•Å‡§ü‡§ø: ' + event.error;
                        stopListening();
                    };
                    
                    recognition.onend = function() {
                        if (isListening) {
                            recognition.start(); // Continue listening
                        }
                    };
                    
                    recognition.onresult = function(event) {
                        let interimTranscript = '';
                        let finalTranscript = '';
                        
                        for (let i = event.resultIndex; i < event.results.length; i++) {
                            const transcript = event.results[i][0].transcript;
                            if (event.results[i].isFinal) {
                                finalTranscript += transcript;
                                processCommand(transcript);
                            } else {
                                interimTranscript += transcript;
                            }
                        }
                        
                        commandStatus.textContent = isListening 
                            ? '‡§∏‡•Å‡§® ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§π‡•Ç‡§Å: ' + interimTranscript 
                            : '‡§Æ‡§æ‡§á‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§´‡•ã‡§® ‡§¨‡§Ç‡§¶';
                    };
                    
                } catch (error) {
                    console.error('Speech recognition not supported', error);
                    commandStatus.textContent = '‡§Ü‡§™‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§â‡§ú‡§º‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§µ‡•â‡§á‡§∏ ‡§∞‡§ø‡§ï‡§ó‡•ç‡§®‡§ø‡§∂‡§® ‡§∏‡§™‡•ã‡§∞‡•ç‡§ü ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡•à';
                    microphoneBtn.disabled = true;
                }
            }
            
            // Toggle microphone
            microphoneBtn.addEventListener('click', function() {
                if (!recognition) {
                    initSpeechRecognition();
                }
                
                if (isListening) {
                    stopListening();
                } else {
                    try {
                        recognition.start();
                    } catch (error) {
                        console.error('Error starting recognition:', error);
                        commandStatus.textContent = '‡§Æ‡§æ‡§á‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§® ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡•Å‡§ü‡§ø';
                    }
                }
            });
            
            function stopListening() {
                if (recognition) {
                    recognition.stop();
                }
                isListening = false;
                microphoneBtn.classList.remove('listening');
                commandStatus.textContent = '‡§Æ‡§æ‡§á‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§´‡•ã‡§® ‡§¨‡§Ç‡§¶';
            }
            
            // Process voice commands
            function processCommand(command) {
                command = command.toLowerCase();
                addCommandToHistory(command);
                
                // Basic command processing (could be enhanced with NLP)
                if (command.includes('‡§π‡•á‡§°‡§∞') || command.includes('header')) {
                    addComponent('header');
                } else if (command.includes('‡§´‡•Ç‡§ü‡§∞') || command.includes('footer')) {
                    addComponent('footer');
                } else if (command.includes('‡§ó‡•à‡§≤‡§∞‡•Ä') || command.includes('gallery')) {
                    addComponent('gallery');
                } else if (command.includes('‡§∏‡§Ç‡§™‡§∞‡•ç‡§ï') || command.includes('contact')) {
                    addComponent('contact');
                } else if (command.includes('‡§π‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç') || command.includes('about')) {
                    addComponent('about');
                } else if (command.includes('‡§∏‡•á‡§µ‡§æ‡§è‡§Ç') || command.includes('services')) {
                    addComponent('services');
                } else if (command.includes('‡§∏‡§Æ‡•Ä‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ') || command.includes('testimonial')) {
                    addComponent('testimonials');
                } else if (command.includes('‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§™‡§æ‡§¶') || command.includes('product')) {
                    addComponent('products');
                } else if (command.includes('‡§∏‡§æ‡§´ ‡§ï‡§∞‡•ã') || command.includes('clear')) {
                    clearWebsite();
                } else if (command.includes('‡§¨‡§Ç‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§∞‡•ã') || command.includes('stop')) {
                    stopListening();
                }
            }
            
            // Add command to history
            function addCommandToHistory(command) {
                const commandElement = document.createElement('div');
                commandElement.className = 'command-bubble bg-blue-100 text-blue-800 rounded-lg py-2 px-4 ml-auto';
                commandElement.textContent = command;
                commandHistory.appendChild(commandElement);
                commandHistory.scrollTop = commandHistory.scrollHeight;
            }
            
            // Add component to website
            function addComponent(componentType) {
                if (!websiteComponents.includes(componentType)) {
                    websiteComponents.push(componentType);
                }
                updateWebsitePreview();
            }
            
            // Update the website preview
            function updateWebsitePreview() {
                let html = '';
                
                // Generate HTML based on selected components
                if (websiteComponents.includes('header')) {
                    html += `
                        <header class="bg-blue-600 text-white py-4 px-6 rounded-t-lg mb-4">
                            <div class="flex justify-between items-center">
                                <h1 class="text-2xl font-bold">‡§Æ‡•á‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§µ‡•á‡§¨‡§∏‡§æ‡§á‡§ü</h1>
                                <nav>
                                    <ul class="flex space-x-6">
                                        <li><a href="#" class="hover:underline">‡§π‡•ã‡§Æ</a></li>
                                        <li><a href="#" class="hover:underline">‡§π‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç</a></li>
                                        <li><a href="#" class="hover:underline">‡§∏‡§Ç‡§™‡§∞‡•ç‡§ï ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç</a></li>
                                    </ul>
                                </nav>
                            </div>
                        </header>
                    `;
                }
                
                if (websiteComponents.includes('about')) {
                    html += `
                        <section class="bg-white p-6 rounded-lg shadow mb-4">
                            <h2 class="text-xl font-semibold mb-3">‡§π‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç</h2>
                            <p class="text-gray-700">‡§Ø‡§π ‡§π‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§Ç‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ ‡§Ü‡§™ ‡§Ø‡§π‡§æ‡§Å ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§Ç‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§µ‡§∞‡§£, ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§∂‡§® ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§¶‡•É‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡§ø‡§ï‡•ã‡§£ ‡§ú‡•ã‡§°‡§º ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§</p>
                            <div class="mt-4 p-4 bg-blue-50 rounded-lg">

                                        <p class="font-medium">‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•Å‡§≤ ‡§∂‡§∞‡•ç‡§Æ‡§æ</p>

                                    </div>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                        </section>
                    `;
                }
                
                if (websiteComponents.includes('services')) {
                    html += `
                        <section class="bg-white p-6 rounded-lg shadow mb-4">
                            <h2 class="text-xl font-semibold mb-3">‡§π‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•á‡§µ‡§æ‡§è‡§Ç</h2>
                            <div class="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 gap-4">
                                <div class="bg-blue-50 p-4 rounded-lg">
                                    <h3 class="font-medium mb-2">‡§µ‡•á‡§¨ ‡§°‡•á‡§µ‡§≤‡§™‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç‡§ü</h3>
                                    <p class="text-gray-700 text-sm">‡§π‡§Æ ‡§Ü‡§™‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§µ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡§ø‡§ï ‡§Ü‡§µ‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡§§‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§®‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§µ‡•á‡§¨‡§∏‡§æ‡§á‡§ü ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡§∏‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§</p>
                                </div>
                                <div class="bg-blue-50 p-4 rounded-lg">

                                        <p>+91 9876543210</p>
                                        <p>info@example.com</p>
                                    </address>

                                    <h3 class="text-lg font-semibold mb-3">‡§∏‡•ã‡§∂‡§≤ ‡§Æ‡•Ä‡§°‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ</h3>
                                    <div class="flex space-x-4">
                                        <a href="#" class="text-gray-400 hover:text-blue-400">[FB]</a>
                                        <a href="#" class="text-gray-400 hover:text-blue-500">[TWITTER]</a>

                                        <a href="#" class="text-gray-400 hover:text-blue-700">[LINKEDIN]</a>

                            </div>
                        </footer>
                    `;
                }
                
                if (html) {
                    websitePreview.innerHTML = html;
                } else {
                    websitePreview.innerHTML = '<div class="text-center text-gray-500">‡§Ü‡§™‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§µ‡•á‡§¨‡§∏‡§æ‡§á‡§ü ‡§Ø‡§π‡§æ‡§Å ‡§¶‡§ø‡§ñ‡§æ‡§à ‡§¶‡•á‡§ó‡•Ä</div>';
                }
            }
            
            // Clear the website
            function clearWebsite() {
                websiteComponents = [];
                updateWebsitePreview();
            }
            
            // Export HTML
            function exportWebsite() {
                const htmlContent = `<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="hi">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>‡§Æ‡•á‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§µ‡•á‡§¨‡§∏‡§æ‡§á‡§ü</title>
    <script src="https://cdn.tailwindcss.com"><\/script>
</head>
<body class="bg-gray-50">
    ${websitePreview.innerHTML}
</body>
</html>`;
                
                const blob = new Blob([htmlContent], {type: 'text/html'});
                const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);
                const a = document.createElement('a');
                a.href = url;
                a.download = 'my-website.html';
                document.body.appendChild(a);
                a.click();
                document.body.removeChild(a);
                URL.revokeObjectURL(url);
            }
            
            // Component buttons
            componentBtns.forEach(btn => {
                btn.addEventListener('click', function() {
                    const component = this.getAttribute('data-component');
                    addComponent(component);
                });
            });
            
            // Export button
            exportHtmlBtn.addEventListener('click', exportWebsite);
            
            // Clear button
            clearAllBtn.addEventListener('click', clearWebsite);
        });
    </script>
</body>
</html>

```

```html
    <script>
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
            const microphoneBtn = document.getElementById('microphoneBtn');
            const commandStatus = document.getElementById('commandStatus');
            const commandHistory = document.getElementById('commandHistory');
            const websitePreview = document.getElementById('websitePreview');
            const componentBtns = document.querySelectorAll('.component-btn');
            const exportHtmlBtn = document.getElementById('exportHtmlBtn');
            const clearAllBtn = document.getElementById('clearAllBtn');
            
            let recognition;
            let isListening = false;
            let websiteComponents = [];
            
            // Initialize speech recognition
            function initSpeechRecognition() {
                try {
                    const SpeechRecognition = window.SpeechRecognition || window.webkitSpeechRecognition;
                    recognition = new SpeechRecognition();
                    recognition.continuous = true;
                    recognition.interimResults = true;
                    recognition.lang = 'hi-IN'; // Hindi (India) as default
                    
                    recognition.onstart = function() {
                        isListening = true;
                        microphoneBtn.classList.add('listening');
                        commandStatus.textContent = '‡§∏‡•Å‡§® ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§π‡•Ç‡§Å... ‡§¨‡•ã‡§≤‡§ø‡§è';
                    };
                    
                    recognition.onerror = function(event) {
                        console.error('Speech recognition error', event.error);
                        commandStatus.textContent = '‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡•Å‡§ü‡§ø: ' + event.error;
                        stopListening();
                    };
                    
                    recognition.onend = function() {
                        if (isListening) {
                            recognition.start(); // Continue listening
                        }
                    };
                    
                    recognition.onresult = function(event) {
                        let interimTranscript = '';
                        let finalTranscript = '';
                        
                        for (let i = event.resultIndex; i < event.results.length; i++) {
                            const transcript = event.results[i][0].transcript;
                            if (event.results[i].isFinal) {
                                finalTranscript += transcript;
                                processCommand(transcript);
                            } else {
                                interimTranscript += transcript;
                            }
                        }
                        
                        commandStatus.textContent = isListening 
                            ? '‡§∏‡•Å‡§® ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§π‡•Ç‡§Å: ' + interimTranscript 
                            : '‡§Æ‡§æ‡§á‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§´‡•ã‡§® ‡§¨‡§Ç‡§¶';
                    };
                    
                } catch (error) {
                    console.error('Speech recognition not supported', error);
                    commandStatus.textContent = '‡§Ü‡§™‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§â‡§ú‡§º‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§µ‡•â‡§á‡§∏ ‡§∞‡§ø‡§ï‡§ó‡•ç‡§®‡§ø‡§∂‡§® ‡§∏‡§™‡•ã‡§∞‡•ç‡§ü ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡•à';
                    microphoneBtn.disabled = true;
                }
            }
            
            // Toggle microphone
            microphoneBtn.addEventListener('click', function() {
                if (!recognition) {
                    initSpeechRecognition();
                }
                
                if (isListening) {
                    stopListening();
                } else {
                    try {
                        recognition.start();
                    } catch (error) {
                        console.error('Error starting recognition:', error);
                        commandStatus.textContent = '‡§Æ‡§æ‡§á‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§® ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡•Å‡§ü‡§ø';
                    }
                }
            });
            
            function stopListening() {
                if (recognition) {
                    recognition.stop();
                }
                isListening = false;
                microphoneBtn.classList.remove('listening');
                commandStatus.textContent = '‡§Æ‡§æ‡§á‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§´‡•ã‡§® ‡§¨‡§Ç‡§¶';
            }
            
            // Process voice commands
            function processCommand(command) {
                command = command.toLowerCase();
                addCommandToHistory(command);
                
                // Basic command processing (could be enhanced with NLP)
                if (command.includes('‡§π‡•á‡§°‡§∞') || command.includes('header')) {
                    addComponent('header');
                } else if (command.includes('‡§´‡•Ç‡§ü‡§∞') || command.includes('footer')) {
                    addComponent('footer');
                } else if (command.includes('‡§ó‡•à‡§≤‡§∞‡•Ä') || command.includes('gallery')) {
                    addComponent('gallery');
                } else if (command.includes('‡§∏‡§Ç‡§™‡§∞‡•ç‡§ï') || command.includes('contact')) {
                    addComponent('contact');
                } else if (command.includes('‡§π‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç') || command.includes('about')) {
                    addComponent('about');
                } else if (command.includes('‡§∏‡•á‡§µ‡§æ‡§è‡§Ç') || command.includes('services')) {
                    addComponent('services');
                } else if (command.includes('‡§∏‡§Æ‡•Ä‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ') || command.includes('testimonial')) {
                    addComponent('testimonials');
                } else if (command.includes('‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§™‡§æ‡§¶') || command.includes('product')) {
                    addComponent('products');
                } else if (command.includes('‡§∏‡§æ‡§´ ‡§ï‡§∞‡•ã') || command.includes('clear')) {
                    clearWebsite();
                } else if (command.includes('‡§¨‡§Ç‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§∞‡•ã') || command.includes('stop')) {
                    stopListening();
                }
            }
            
            // Add command to history
            function addCommandToHistory(command) {
                const commandElement = document.createElement('div');
                commandElement.className = 'command-bubble bg-blue-100 text-blue-800 rounded-lg py-2 px-4 ml-auto';
                commandElement.textContent = command;
                commandHistory.appendChild(commandElement);
                commandHistory.scrollTop = commandHistory.scrollHeight;
            }
            
            // Add component to website
            function addComponent(componentType) {
                if (!websiteComponents.includes(componentType)) {
                    websiteComponents.push(componentType);
                }
                updateWebsitePreview();
            }
            
            // Update the website preview

                                        <p>123 ‡§Æ‡•á‡§® ‡§∏‡•ç‡§ü‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ü, ‡§®‡§à ‡§¶‡§ø‡§≤‡•ç‡§≤‡•Ä</p>

                            </div>

                                <p>¬© ${new Date().getFullYear()} ‡§Æ‡•á‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§µ‡•á‡§¨‡§∏‡§æ‡§á‡§ü. ‡§∏‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§ß‡§ø‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§∏‡•Å‡§∞‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§ø‡§§</p>
                            </div>
                        </footer>
                    `;
                }
                
                if (html) {
                    websitePreview.innerHTML = html;
                } else {
                    websitePreview.innerHTML = '<div class="text-center text-gray-500">‡§Ü‡§™‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§µ‡•á‡§¨‡§∏‡§æ‡§á‡§ü ‡§Ø‡§π‡§æ‡§Å ‡§¶‡§ø‡§ñ‡§æ‡§à ‡§¶‡•á‡§ó‡•Ä</div>';
                }
            }
            
            // Clear the website
            function clearWebsite() {
                websiteComponents = [];
                updateWebsitePreview();
            }
            
            // Export HTML
            function exportWebsite() {
                const htmlContent = `<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="hi">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>‡§Æ‡•á‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§µ‡•á‡§¨‡§∏‡§æ‡§á‡§ü</title>
    <script src="https://cdn.tailwindcss.com"><\/script>
</head>
<body class="bg-gray-50">
    ${websitePreview.innerHTML}
</body>
</html>`;
                
                const blob = new Blob([htmlContent], {type: 'text/html'});
                const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);
                const a = document.createElement('a');
                a.href = url;
                a.download = 'my-website.html';
                document.body.appendChild(a);
                a.click();
                document.body.removeChild(a);
                URL.revokeObjectURL(url);
            }
            
            // Component buttons
            componentBtns.forEach(btn => {
                btn.addEventListener('click', function() {
                    const component = this.getAttribute('data-component');
                    addComponent(component);
                });
            });
            
            // Export button
            exportHtmlBtn.addEventListener('click', exportWebsite);
            
            // Clear button
            clearAllBtn.addEventListener('click', clearWebsite);
        });
    </script>
</body>
</html>

```

```html
                    </button>
                    <button id="clearAllBtn" class="bg-red-500 hover:bg-red-600 text-white font-medium py-2 px-4 rounded-lg">
                        ‡§∏‡§¨ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§´‡§º ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç

    <script>
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
            const microphoneBtn = document.getElementById('microphoneBtn');
            const commandStatus = document.getElementById('commandStatus');
            const commandHistory = document.getElementById('commandHistory');
            const websitePreview = document.getElementById('websitePreview');
            const componentBtns = document.querySelectorAll('.component-btn');
            const exportHtmlBtn = document.getElementById('exportHtmlBtn');
            const clearAllBtn = document.getElementById('clearAllBtn');
            
            let recognition;
            let isListening = false;
            let websiteComponents = [];
            
            // Initialize speech recognition
            function initSpeechRecognition() {
                try {
                    const SpeechRecognition = window.SpeechRecognition || window.webkitSpeechRecognition;
                    recognition = new SpeechRecognition();
                    recognition.continuous = true;
                    recognition.interimResults = true;
                    recognition.lang = 'hi-IN'; // Hindi (India) as default
                    
                    recognition.onstart = function() {
                        isListening = true;
                        microphoneBtn.classList.add('listening');
                        commandStatus.textContent = '‡§∏‡•Å‡§® ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§π‡•Ç‡§Å... ‡§¨‡•ã‡§≤‡§ø‡§è';
                    };
                    
                    recognition.onerror = function(event) {
                        console.error('Speech recognition error', event.error);
                        commandStatus.textContent = '‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡•Å‡§ü‡§ø: ' + event.error;
                        stopListening();
                    };
                    
                    recognition.onend = function() {
                        if (isListening) {
                            recognition.start(); // Continue listening
                        }
                    };
                    
                    recognition.onresult = function(event) {
                        let interimTranscript = '';
                        let finalTranscript = '';
                        
                        for (let i = event.resultIndex; i < event.results.length; i++) {
                            const transcript = event.results[i][0].transcript;
                            if (event.results[i].isFinal) {
                                finalTranscript += transcript;
                                processCommand(transcript);
                            } else {
                                interimTranscript += transcript;
                            }
                        }
                        
                        commandStatus.textContent = isListening 
                            ? '‡§∏‡•Å‡§® ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§π‡•Ç‡§Å: ' + interimTranscript 
                            : '‡§Æ‡§æ‡§á‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§´‡•ã‡§® ‡§¨‡§Ç‡§¶';
                    };
                    
                } catch (error) {
                    console.error('Speech recognition not supported', error);
                    commandStatus.textContent = '‡§Ü‡§™‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§â‡§ú‡§º‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§µ‡•â‡§á‡§∏ ‡§∞‡§ø‡§ï‡§ó‡•ç‡§®‡§ø‡§∂‡§® ‡§∏‡§™‡•ã‡§∞‡•ç‡§ü ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡•à';
                    microphoneBtn.disabled = true;
                }
            }
            
            // Toggle microphone
            microphoneBtn.addEventListener('click', function() {
                if (!recognition) {
                    initSpeechRecognition();
                }
                
                if (isListening) {
                    stopListening();
                } else {
                    try {
                        recognition.start();
                    } catch (error) {
                        console.error('Error starting recognition:', error);
                        commandStatus.textContent = '‡§Æ‡§æ‡§á‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§® ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡•Å‡§ü‡§ø';
                    }
                }
            });
            
            function stopListening() {
                if (recognition) {
                    recognition.stop();
                }
                isListening = false;
                microphoneBtn.classList.remove('listening');
                commandStatus.textContent = '‡§Æ‡§æ‡§á‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§´‡•ã‡§® ‡§¨‡§Ç‡§¶';
            }
            
            // Process voice commands
            function processCommand(command) {
                command = command.toLowerCase();
                addCommandToHistory(command);
                
                // Basic command processing (could be enhanced with NLP)
                if (command.includes('‡§π‡•á‡§°‡§∞') || command.includes('header')) {
                    addComponent('header');
                } else if (command.includes('‡§´‡•Ç‡§ü‡§∞') || command.includes('footer')) {
                    addComponent('footer');
                } else if (command.includes('‡§ó‡•à‡§≤‡§∞‡•Ä') || command.includes('gallery')) {
                    addComponent('gallery');
                } else if (command.includes('‡§∏‡§Ç‡§™‡§∞‡•ç‡§ï') || command.includes('contact')) {
                    addComponent('contact');
                } else if (command.includes('‡§π‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç') || command.includes('about')) {
                    addComponent('about');
                } else if (command.includes('‡§∏‡•á‡§µ‡§æ‡§è‡§Ç') || command.includes('services')) {
                    addComponent('services');
                } else if (command.includes('‡§∏‡§Æ‡•Ä‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ') || command.includes('testimonial')) {
                    addComponent('testimonials');
                } else if (command.includes('‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§™‡§æ‡§¶') || command.includes('product')) {
                    addComponent('products');
                } else if (command.includes('python') || command.includes('‡§™‡§æ‡§Ø‡§•‡§®')) {
                    addComponent('python');
                } else if (command.includes('c++') || command.includes('‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§™‡•ç‡§≤‡§∏ ‡§™‡•ç‡§≤‡§∏')) {
                    addComponent('cpp');
                } else if (command.includes('‡§∏‡§æ‡§´ ‡§ï‡§∞‡•ã') || command.includes('clear')) {
                    clearWebsite();
                } else if (command.includes('‡§¨‡§Ç‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§∞‡•ã') || command.includes('stop')) {
                    stopListening();
                }
            }
            
            // Add command to history
            function addCommandToHistory(command) {
                const commandElement = document.createElement('div');
                commandElement.className = 'command-bubble bg-blue-100 text-blue-800 rounded-lg py-2 px-4 ml-auto';
                commandElement.textContent = command;
                commandHistory.appendChild(commandElement);
                commandHistory.scrollTop = commandHistory.scrollHeight;
            }
            
            // Add component to website
            function addComponent(componentType) {
                if (!websiteComponents.includes(componentType)) {
                    websiteComponents.push(componentType);
                }
                updateWebsitePreview();
            }
            
            // Update the website preview
            function updateWebsitePreview() {
                let html = '';
                
                // Generate HTML based on selected components
                if (websiteComponents.includes('header')) {
                    html += `
                        <header class="bg-blue-600 text-white py-4 px-6 rounded-t-lg mb-4">
                            <div class="flex justify-between items-center">
                                <h1 class="text-2xl font-bold">‡§Æ‡•á‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§µ‡•á‡§¨‡§∏‡§æ‡§á‡§ü</h1>
                                <nav>
                                    <ul class="flex space-x-6">
                                        <li><a href="#" class="hover:underline">‡§π‡•ã‡§Æ</a></li>
                                        <li><a href="#" class="hover:underline">‡§π‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç</a></li>
                                        <li><a href="#" class="hover:underline">‡§∏‡§Ç‡§™‡§∞‡•ç‡§ï ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç</a></li>
                                    </ul>
                                </nav>
                            </div>
                        </header>
                    `;
                }
                
                if (websiteComponents.includes('about')) {
                    html += `
                        <section class="bg-white p-6 rounded-lg shadow mb-4">

            function clearWebsite() {
                websiteComponents = [];
                updateWebsitePreview();
            }
            
            // Export HTML
            function exportWebsite() {
                const htmlContent = `<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="hi">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>‡§Æ‡•á‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§µ‡•á‡§¨‡§∏‡§æ‡§á‡§ü</title>
    <script src="https://cdn.tailwindcss.com"><\/script>
</head>
<body class="bg-gray-50">
    ${websitePreview.innerHTML}
</body>
</html>`;
                
                const blob = new Blob([htmlContent], {type: 'text/html'});
                const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);
                const a = document.createElement('a');
                a.href = url;
                a.download = 'my-website.html';
                document.body.appendChild(a);
                a.click();
                document.body.removeChild(a);
                URL.revokeObjectURL(url);
            }
            
            // Component buttons
            componentBtns.forEach(btn => {
                btn.addEventListener('click', function() {
                    const component = this.getAttribute('data-component');
                    addComponent(component);
                });
            });
            
            // Export button
            exportHtmlBtn.addEventListener('click', exportWebsite);
            
            // Clear button
            clearAllBtn.addEventListener('click', clearWebsite);
        });
    </script>
</body>
</html>

```
### YOU
Create in this application 
### BLACKBOX.AI

```html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="hi">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>‡§µ‡•â‡§á‡§∏ ‡§µ‡•á‡§¨‡§∏‡§æ‡§á‡§ü ‡§¨‡§ø‡§≤‡•ç‡§°‡§∞</title>
    <script src="https://cdn.tailwindcss.com"></script>
    <style>
        @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Poppins:wght@400;500;600;700&family=Hind+Siliguri:wght@400;500;600&display=swap');
        
        body {
            font-family: 'Poppins', 'Hind Siliguri', sans-serif;
        }
        
        .microphone-btn {
            transition: all 0.3s;
        }
        
        .microphone-btn.listening {
            animation: pulse 1.5s infinite;
        }
        
        @keyframes pulse {
            0% { box-shadow: 0 0 0 0 rgba(59, 130, 246, 0.7); }
            70% { box-shadow: 0 0 0 10px rgba(59, 130, 246, 0); }
            100% { box-shadow: 0 0 0 0 rgba(59, 130, 246, 0); }
        }
        
        .preview-container {
            min-height: 300px;
            border: 2px dashed #e5e7eb;
        }
        
        .command-bubble {
            max-width: 80%;
            animation: fadeIn 0.3s;
        }
        
        @keyframes fadeIn {
            from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(10px); }
            to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); }
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body class="bg-gray-50">
    <div class="container mx-auto px-4 py-8">
        <!-- Header Section -->
        <header class="text-center mb-12">
            <div class="flex justify-center mb-6">
                <img src="https://storage.googleapis.com/workspace-0f70711f-8b4e-4d94-86f1-2a93ccde5887/image/eacaa7ee-c5b8-4332-a581-a41d66cef615.png" alt="Voice control interface with microphone icon and sound waves" class="rounded-full" />
            </div>
            <h1 class="text-3xl md:text-4xl font-bold text-gray-800 mb-2">‡§µ‡•â‡§á‡§∏ ‡§µ‡•á‡§¨‡§∏‡§æ‡§á‡§ü ‡§¨‡§ø‡§≤‡•ç‡§°‡§∞</h1>
            <p class="text-lg text-gray-600">‡§¨‡•ã‡§≤‡§ø‡§è, ‡§π‡§Æ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§è‡§Ç‡§ó‡•á! ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§µ‡•á‡§¨‡§∏‡§æ‡§á‡§ü ‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§ê‡§™ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∏‡§ø‡§∞‡•ç‡§´ ‡§¨‡•ã‡§≤‡§ï‡§∞ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§è‡§Ç</p>
        </header>

        <!-- Main Content -->
        <main>
            <!-- Voice Command Section -->
            <div class="bg-white rounded-xl shadow-md p-6 mb-8">
                <h2 class="text-xl font-semibold text-gray-800 mb-4">‡§µ‡•â‡§á‡§∏ ‡§ï‡§Æ‡§æ‡§Ç‡§° ‡§¶‡•á‡§Ç</h2>
                
                <div class="flex flex-col items-center space-y-4">
                    <button id="microphoneBtn" class="microphone-btn bg-blue-500 hover:bg-blue-600 text-white font-medium py-3 px-6 rounded-full flex items-center">
                        <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="h-6 w-6 mr-2" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke="currentColor">
                            <path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M19 11a7 7 0 01-7 7m0 0a7 7 0 01-7-7m7 7v4m0 0H8m4 0h4m-4-8a3 3 0 01-3-3V5a3 3 0 116 0v6a3 3 0 01-3 3z" />
                        </svg>
                        ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§á‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§´‡•ã‡§® ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç
                    </button>
                    
                    <div id="commandStatus" class="text-gray-500 text-sm">‡§Æ‡§æ‡§á‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§´‡•ã‡§® ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§¨‡§ü‡§® ‡§¶‡§¨‡§æ‡§è‡§Ç</div>
                </div>
                
                <div id="commandHistory" class="mt-6 space-y-2"></div>
            </div>
            
            <!-- Website Components Selection -->
            <div class="bg-white rounded-xl shadow-md p-6 mb-8">
                <h2 class="text-xl font-semibold text-gray-800 mb-4">‡§µ‡•á‡§¨‡§∏‡§æ‡§á‡§ü ‡§ï‡•â‡§Æ‡•ç‡§™‡•ã‡§®‡•á‡§Ç‡§ü‡•ç‡§∏</h2>
                <p class="text-gray-600 mb-4">‡§Ü‡§™ ‡§á‡§® ‡§ï‡•â‡§Æ‡•ç‡§™‡•ã‡§®‡•á‡§Ç‡§ü‡•ç‡§∏ ‡§ï‡•ã ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§µ‡•á‡§¨‡§∏‡§æ‡§á‡§ü ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ú‡•ã‡§°‡§º ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç:</p>
                
                <div class="grid grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-3 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-4">
                    <button class="component-btn bg-blue-50 text-blue-700 hover:bg-blue-100 py-2 px-4 rounded-lg border border-blue-200" data-component="header">
                        ‡§π‡•á‡§°‡§∞
                    </button>
                    <button class="component-btn bg-blue-50 text-blue-700 hover:bg-blue-100 py-2 px-4 rounded-lg border border-blue-200" data-component="footer">
                        ‡§´‡•Ç‡§ü‡§∞
                    </button>
                    <button class="component-btn bg-blue-50 text-blue-700 hover:bg-blue-100 py-2 px-4 rounded-lg border border-blue-200" data-component="gallery">
                        ‡§ó‡•à‡§≤‡§∞‡•Ä
                    </button>
                    <button class="component-btn bg-blue-50 text-blue-700 hover:bg-blue-100 py-2 px-4 rounded-lg border border-blue-200" data-component="contact">
                        ‡§∏‡§Ç‡§™‡§∞‡•ç‡§ï ‡§´‡•â‡§∞‡•ç‡§Æ
                    </button>
                    <button class="component-btn bg-blue-50 text-blue-700 hover:bg-blue-100 py-2 px-4 rounded-lg border border-blue-200" data-component="about">
                        ‡§π‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç
                    </button>
                    <button class="component-btn bg-blue-50 text-blue-700 hover:bg-blue-100 py-2 px-4 rounded-lg border border-blue-200" data-component="services">
                        ‡§∏‡•á‡§µ‡§æ‡§è‡§Ç
                    </button>
                    <button class="component-btn bg-blue-50 text-blue-700 hover:bg-blue-100 py-2 px-4 rounded-lg border border-blue-200" data-component="testimonials">
                        ‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡§ï ‡§∏‡§Æ‡•Ä‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ
                    </button>
                    <button class="component-btn bg-blue-50 text-blue-700 hover:bg-blue-100 py-2 px-4 rounded-lg border border-blue-200" data-component="products">
                        ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§™‡§æ‡§¶
                    </button>
                    <button class="component-btn bg-blue-50 text-blue-700 hover:bg-blue-100 py-2 px-4 rounded-lg border border-blue-200" data-component="python">
                        Python ‡§ï‡•ã‡§°
                    </button>
                    <button class="component-btn bg-blue-50 text-blue-700 hover:bg-blue-100 py-2 px-4 rounded-lg border border-blue-200" data-component="cpp">

                    </button>

                        ‡§ï‡•ã‡§° ‡§è‡§°‡§ø‡§ü‡§∞
                    </button>
                </div>
            </div>
            
            <!-- Website Preview -->
            <div class="bg-white rounded-xl shadow-md p-6">
                <h2 class="text-xl font-semibold text-gray-800 mb-4">‡§Ü‡§™‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§µ‡•á‡§¨‡§∏‡§æ‡§á‡§ü ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡•Ä‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡•Ç</h2>
                
                <div id="websitePreview" class="preview-container rounded-lg p-4 bg-gray-50 mb-4">
                    <div class="text-center text-gray-500">‡§Ü‡§™‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§µ‡•á‡§¨‡§∏‡§æ‡§á‡§ü ‡§Ø‡§π‡§æ‡§Å ‡§¶‡§ø‡§ñ‡§æ‡§à ‡§¶‡•á‡§ó‡•Ä</div>
                </div>
                
                <div class="flex flex-wrap gap-3">
                    <button id="exportHtmlBtn" class="bg-green-500 hover:bg-green-600 text-white font-medium py-2 px-4 rounded-lg">
                        HTML ‡§è‡§ï‡•ç‡§∏‡§™‡•ã‡§∞‡•ç‡§ü ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç
                    </button>
                    <button id="clearAllBtn" class="bg-red-500 hover:bg-red-600 text-white font-medium py-2 px-4 rounded-lg">
                        ‡§∏‡§¨ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§´‡§º ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç
                    </button>
                </div>

    <script>
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
            const microphoneBtn = document.getElementById('microphoneBtn');
            const commandStatus = document.getElementById('commandStatus');
            const commandHistory = document.getElementById('commandHistory');
            const websitePreview = document.getElementById('websitePreview');
            const componentBtns = document.querySelectorAll('.component-btn');
            const exportHtmlBtn = document.getElementById('exportHtmlBtn');
            const clearAllBtn = document.getElementById('clearAllBtn');
            
            let recognition;
            let isListening = false;
            let websiteComponents = [];
            
            // Initialize speech recognition
            function initSpeechRecognition() {
                try {
                    const SpeechRecognition = window.SpeechRecognition || window.webkitSpeechRecognition;
                    recognition = new SpeechRecognition();
                    recognition.continuous = true;
                    recognition.interimResults = true;
                    recognition.lang = 'hi-IN'; // Hindi (India) as default
                    
                    recognition.onstart = function() {
                        isListening = true;
                        microphoneBtn.classList.add('listening');
                        commandStatus.textContent = '‡§∏‡•Å‡§® ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§π‡•Ç‡§Å... ‡§¨‡•ã‡§≤‡§ø‡§è';
                    };
                    
                    recognition.onerror = function(event) {
                        console.error('Speech recognition error', event.error);
                        commandStatus.textContent = '‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡•Å‡§ü‡§ø: ' + event.error;
                        stopListening();
                    };
                    
                    recognition.onend = function() {
                        if (isListening) {
                            recognition.start(); // Continue listening
                        }
                    };
                    
                    recognition.onresult = function(event) {
                        let interimTranscript = '';
                        let finalTranscript = '';
                        
                        for (let i = event.resultIndex; i < event.results.length; i++) {
                            const transcript = event.results[i][0].transcript;
                            if (event.results[i].isFinal) {
                                finalTranscript += transcript;
                                processCommand(transcript);
                            } else {
                                interimTranscript += transcript;
                            }
                        }
                        
                        commandStatus.textContent = isListening 
                            ? '‡§∏‡•Å‡§® ‡§∞‡§π‡§æ ‡§π‡•Ç‡§Å: ' + interimTranscript 
                            : '‡§Æ‡§æ‡§á‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§´‡•ã‡§® ‡§¨‡§Ç‡§¶';
                    };
                    
                } catch (error) {
                    console.error('Speech recognition not supported', error);
                    commandStatus.textContent = '‡§Ü‡§™‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§â‡§ú‡§º‡§∞ ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§µ‡•â‡§á‡§∏ ‡§∞‡§ø‡§ï‡§ó‡•ç‡§®‡§ø‡§∂‡§® ‡§∏‡§™‡•ã‡§∞‡•ç‡§ü ‡§®‡§π‡•Ä‡§Ç ‡§π‡•à';
                    microphoneBtn.disabled = true;
                }
            }
            
            // Toggle microphone
            microphoneBtn.addEventListener('click', function() {
                if (!recognition) {
                    initSpeechRecognition();
                }
                
                if (isListening) {
                    stopListening();
                } else {
                    try {
                        recognition.start();
                    } catch (error) {
                        console.error('Error starting recognition:', error);
                        commandStatus.textContent = '‡§Æ‡§æ‡§á‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§® ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç ‡§ï‡§∞‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§§‡•ç‡§∞‡•Å‡§ü‡§ø';
                    }
                }
            });
            
            function stopListening() {
                if (recognition) {
                    recognition.stop();
                }
                isListening = false;
                microphoneBtn.classList.remove('listening');
                commandStatus.textContent = '‡§Æ‡§æ‡§á‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡•ã‡§´‡•ã‡§® ‡§¨‡§Ç‡§¶';
            }
            
            // Process voice commands
            function processCommand(command) {
                command = command.toLowerCase();
                addCommandToHistory(command);
                
                // Basic command processing (could be enhanced with NLP)
                if (command.includes('‡§π‡•á‡§°‡§∞') || command.includes('header')) {
                    addComponent('header');
                } else if (command.includes('‡§´‡•Ç‡§ü‡§∞') || command.includes('footer')) {
                    addComponent('footer');
                } else if (command.includes('‡§ó‡•à‡§≤‡§∞‡•Ä') || command.includes('gallery')) {
                    addComponent('gallery');
                } else if (command.includes('‡§∏‡§Ç‡§™‡§∞‡•ç‡§ï') || command.includes('contact')) {
                    addComponent('contact');
                } else if (command.includes('‡§π‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç') || command.includes('about')) {
                    addComponent('about');
                } else if (command.includes('‡§∏‡•á‡§µ‡§æ‡§è‡§Ç') || command.includes('services')) {
                    addComponent('services');
                } else if (command.includes('‡§∏‡§Æ‡•Ä‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ') || command.includes('testimonial')) {
                    addComponent('testimonials');
                } else if (command.includes('‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§™‡§æ‡§¶') || command.includes('product')) {
                    addComponent('products');
                } else if (command.includes('python') || command.includes('‡§™‡§æ‡§Ø‡§•‡§®')) {
                    addComponent('python');
                } else if (command.includes('c++') || command.includes('‡§∏‡•Ä ‡§™‡•ç‡§≤‡§∏ ‡§™‡•ç‡§≤‡§∏')) {
                    addComponent('cpp');
                } else if (command.includes('code editor') || command.includes('‡§ï‡•ã‡§° ‡§è‡§°‡§ø‡§ü‡§∞')) {
                    addComponent('code-editor');
                } else if (command.includes('‡§∏‡§æ‡§´ ‡§ï‡§∞‡•ã') || command.includes('clear')) {
                    clearWebsite();
                } else if (command.includes('‡§¨‡§Ç‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§∞‡•ã') || command.includes('stop')) {
                    stopListening();
                }
            }
            
            // Add command to history
            function addCommandToHistory(command) {
                const commandElement = document.createElement('div');
                commandElement.className = 'command-bubble bg-blue-100 text-blue-800 rounded-lg py-2 px-4 ml-auto';
                commandElement.textContent = command;
                commandHistory.appendChild(commandElement);
                commandHistory.scrollTop = commandHistory.scrollHeight;
            }
            
            // Add component to website
            function addComponent(componentType) {
                if (!websiteComponents.includes(componentType)) {
                    websiteComponents.push(componentType);
                }
                updateWebsitePreview();
            }
            
            // Update the website preview
            function updateWebsitePreview() {
                let html = '';
                
                // Generate HTML based on selected components
                if (websiteComponents.includes('header')) {
                    html += `
                        <header class="bg-blue-600 text-white py-4 px-6 rounded-t-lg mb-4">
                            <div class="flex justify-between items-center">
                                <h1 class="text-2xl font-bold">‡§Æ‡•á‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§µ‡•á‡§¨‡§∏‡§æ‡§á‡§ü</h1>
                                <nav>
                                    <ul class="flex space-x-6">
                                        <li><a href="#" class="hover:underline">‡§π‡•ã‡§Æ</a></li>
                                        <li><a href="#" class="hover:underline">‡§π‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç</a></li>
                                        <li><a href="#" class="hover:underline">‡§∏‡§Ç‡§™‡§∞‡•ç‡§ï ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç</a></li>
                                    </ul>
                                </nav>
                            </div>
                        </header>
                    `;
                }
                
                if (websiteComponents.includes('about')) {
                    html += `
                        <section class="bg-white p-6 rounded-lg shadow mb-4">
                            <h2 class="text-xl font-semibold mb-3">‡§π‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç</h2>
                            <p class="text-gray-700">‡§Ø‡§π ‡§π‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§Ç‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ï‡•á ‡§¨‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ú‡§æ‡§®‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§π‡•à‡•§ ‡§Ü‡§™ ‡§Ø‡§π‡§æ‡§Å ‡§Ö‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§Ç‡§™‡§®‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§æ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§µ‡§∞‡§£, ‡§Æ‡§ø‡§∂‡§® ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§¶‡•É‡§∑‡•ç‡§ü‡§ø‡§ï‡•ã‡§£ ‡§ú‡•ã‡§°‡§º ‡§∏‡§ï‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§</p>
                            <div class="mt-4 p-4 bg-blue-50 rounded-lg">
                                <h3 class="font-medium mb-2">‡§π‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§ü‡•Ä‡§Æ</h3>
                                <div class="grid grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-4 gap-4 mt-2">
                                    <div class="text-center">
                                        <img src="https://storage.googleapis.com/workspace-0f70711f-8b4e-4d94-86f1-2a93ccde5887/image/ffdc4a13-b08a-4c75-8203-e877ce78f5aa.png" alt="Team member portrait: smiling Indian man with glasses, professional attire" class="w-full h-auto rounded-full mb-2 mx-auto">
                                        <p class="font-medium">‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•Å‡§≤ ‡§∂‡§∞‡•ç‡§Æ‡§æ</p>
                                        <p class="text-sm text-gray-600">‡§∏‡§Ç‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§æ‡§™‡§ï</p>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="text-center">
                                        <img src="https://storage.googleapis.com/workspace-0f70711f-8b4e-4d94-86f1-2a93ccde5887/image/f261455f-511a-48b6-a81b-323d67f11389.png" alt="Team member portrait: young Indian woman with traditional attire, confident expression" class="w-full h-auto rounded-full mb-2 mx-auto">
                                        <p class="font-medium">‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§™‡§ü‡•á‡§≤</p>
                                        <p class="text-sm text-gray-600">‡§°‡§ø‡§ú‡§º‡§æ‡§á‡§®‡§∞</p>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                        </section>
                    `;
                }
                
                if (websiteComponents.includes('services')) {
                    html += `
                        <section class="bg-white p-6 rounded-lg shadow mb-4">
                            <h2 class="text-xl font-semibold mb-3">‡§π‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•á‡§µ‡§æ‡§è‡§Ç</h2>
                            <div class="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 gap-4">
                                <div class="bg-blue-50 p-4 rounded-lg">
                                    <h3 class="font-medium mb-2">‡§µ‡•á‡§¨ ‡§°‡•á‡§µ‡§≤‡§™‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç‡§ü</h3>
                                    <p class="text-gray-700 text-sm">‡§π‡§Æ ‡§Ü‡§™‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§µ‡§∏‡§æ‡§Ø‡§ø‡§ï ‡§Ü‡§µ‡§∂‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡§§‡§æ‡§ì‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§Ö‡§®‡•Å‡§∞‡•Ç‡§™ ‡§µ‡•á‡§¨‡§∏‡§æ‡§á‡§ü ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ï‡§∏‡§ø‡§§ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§§‡•á ‡§π‡•à‡§Ç‡•§</p>
                                </div>
                                <div class="bg-blue-50 p-4 rounded-lg">
                                    <h3 class="font-medium mb-2">‡§Æ‡•ã‡§¨‡§æ‡§á‡§≤ ‡§ê‡§™‡•ç‡§∏</h3>
                                    <p class="text-gray-700 text-sm">Android ‡§î‡§∞ iOS ‡§¶‡•ã‡§®‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§™‡•ç‡§≤‡•á‡§ü‡§´‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§Æ‡•ã‡§Ç ‡§ï‡•á ‡§≤‡§ø‡§è ‡§ê‡§™‡•ç‡§∏ ‡§¨‡§®‡§æ‡§è‡§Ç‡•§</p>
                                </div>
                                <div class="bg-blue-50 p-4 rounded-lg">
                                    <h3 class="font-medium mb-2">‡§°‡§ø‡§ú‡§ø‡§ü‡§≤ ‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§ï‡•á‡§ü‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ó</h3>
                                    <p class="text-gray-700 text-sm">‡§Ü‡§™‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§ë‡§®‡§≤‡§æ‡§á‡§® ‡§â‡§™‡§∏‡•ç‡§•‡§ø‡§§‡§ø ‡§¨‡§¢‡§º‡§æ‡§®‡•á ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§Æ‡§¶‡§¶ ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§Ç‡•§</p>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                        </section>
                    `;
                }
                
                if (websiteComponents.includes('gallery')) {
                    html += `
                        <section class="bg-white p-6 rounded-lg shadow mb-4">
                            <h2 class="text-xl font-semibold mb-3">‡§π‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞‡§æ ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Æ</h2>
                            <div class="grid grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-3 gap-4">
                                <img src="https://storage.googleapis.com/workspace-0f70711f-8b4e-4d94-86f1-2a93ccde5887/image/40b64b95-addb-422a-b3a5-4b87b44264dd.png" alt="Web design project screenshot showing modern interface with blue color scheme" class="w-full h-auto rounded-lg" />
                                <img src="https://storage.googleapis.com/workspace-0f70711f-8b4e-4d94-86f1-2a93ccde5887/image/4c7cd8b6-170b-47e7-ae33-6d4e48999117.png" alt="Mobile app interface design with clean typography and intuitive navigation" class="w-full h-auto rounded-lg" />
                                <img src="https://storage.googleapis.com/workspace-0f70711f-8b4e-4d94-86f1-2a93ccde5887/image/3fe15496-c375-4f92-af7a-7184d987ecc1.png" alt="Team working together in a modern office space with laptops" class="w-full h-auto rounded-lg" />
                            </div>
                        </section>
                    `;
                }
                
                if (websiteComponents.includes('products')) {
                    html += `
                        <section class="bg-white p-6 rounded-lg shadow mb-4">
                            <h2 class="text-xl font-semibold mb-3">‡§π‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞‡•á ‡§â‡§§‡•ç‡§™‡§æ‡§¶</h2>
                            <div class="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-4 gap-4">
                                <div class="border rounded-lg p-3">
                                    <img src="https://storage.googleapis.com/workspace-0f70711f-8b4e-4d94-86f1-2a93ccde5887/image/a047abbd-8e3c-4c9d-9edc-0684c739640d.png" alt="E-commerce product: wireless headphones with sleek design" class="w-full h-auto mb-2" />
                                    <h3 class="font-medium">‡§µ‡§æ‡§Ø‡§∞‡§≤‡•á‡§∏ ‡§π‡•á‡§°‡§´‡•ã‡§®</h3>
                                    <p class="text-gray-600 text-sm mb-1">‚Çπ2,999</p>
                                    <button class="bg-blue-500 text-white text-sm py-1 px-3 rounded hover:bg-blue-600 w-full">‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§ü ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ú‡•ã‡§°‡§º‡•á‡§Ç</button>
                                </div>
                                <div class="border rounded-lg p-3">
                                    <img src="https://storage.googleapis.com/workspace-0f70711f-8b4e-4d94-86f1-2a93ccde5887/image/7d97a17f-8baa-48b4-a6c2-c6fe7934016a.png" alt="Smart watch with fitness tracking features and touch screen" class="w-full h-auto mb-2" />
                                    <h3 class="font-medium">‡§∏‡•ç‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§ü ‡§µ‡•â‡§ö</h3>
                                    <p class="text-gray-600 text-sm mb-1">‚Çπ4,499</p>
                                    <button class="bg-blue-500 text-white text-sm py-1 px-3 rounded hover:bg-blue-600 w-full">‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§ü ‡§Æ‡•á‡§Ç ‡§ú‡•ã‡§°‡§º‡•á‡§Ç</button>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                        </section>
                    `;
                }
                
                if (websiteComponents.includes('testimonials')) {
                    html += `

                            <h2 class="text-xl font-semibold mb-3">‡§ó‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡§ï ‡§∏‡§Æ‡•Ä‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ‡§è‡§Ç</h2>
                            <div class="space-y-4">

                                </div>

                                    <div class="flex items-center mb-2">

                }
                
                if (websiteComponents.includes('contact')) {
                    html += `

                if (websiteComponents.includes('footer')) {

                } else if (websiteComponents.includes('python')) {

int main() {
    cout &lt;&lt; "‡§®‡§Æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡•á ‡§¶‡•Å‡§®‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ!" &lt;&lt; endl;
    return 0;
}
                            </code>
                            </pre>
                        </section>
                    `;
                }
                
                if (html) {
                    websitePreview.innerHTML = html;
                } else {
                    websitePreview.innerHTML = '<div class="text-center text-gray-500">‡§Ü‡§™‡§ï‡•Ä ‡§µ‡•á‡§¨‡§∏‡§æ‡§á‡§ü ‡§Ø‡§π‡§æ‡§Å ‡§¶‡§ø‡§ñ‡§æ‡§à ‡§¶‡•á‡§ó‡•Ä</div>';
                }
            }
            
            // Clear the website
            function clearWebsite() {
                websiteComponents = [];
                updateWebsitePreview();
            }
            
            // Export HTML
            function exportWebsite() {
                const htmlContent = `<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="hi">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>‡§Æ‡•á‡§∞‡•Ä ‡§µ‡•á‡§¨‡§∏‡§æ‡§á‡§ü</title>
    <script src="https://cdn.tailwindcss.com"><\/script>
</head>
<body class="bg-gray-50">
    ${websitePreview.innerHTML}
</body>
</html>`;
                
                const blob = new Blob([htmlContent], {type: 'text/html'});
                const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);
                const a = document.createElement('a');
                a.href = url;
                a.download = 'my-website.html';
                document.body.appendChild(a);
                a.click();
                document.body.removeChild(a);
                URL.revokeObjectURL(url);
            }
            
            // Component buttons
            componentBtns.forEach(btn => {
                btn.addEventListener('click', function() {
                    const component = this.getAttribute('data-component');
                    addComponent(component);
                });
            });
            
            // Export button
            exportHtmlBtn.addEventListener('click', exportWebsite);
            
            // Clear button
            clearAllBtn.addEventListener('click', clearWebsite);
        });
    </script>
</body>
</html>

```
